amendment.description: To provide temporary authority for waiver of collection of payments due for CHAMPUS benefits received by disabled persons unaware of loss of CHAMPUS eligibility and continuation of such benefits.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3210 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3210 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S5786-5787; text: CR S5786-5787) To provide temporary authority for waiver of collection of payments due for CHAMPUS benefits received by disabled persons unaware of loss of CHAMPUS eligibility and continuation of such benefits.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3210 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3210 proposed by Senator Warner.
